name: Shark Bites
description:
You're the shark, how many swimmers can you eat? Move your shark from side to side eating the swimmers as they swim to the beach. Eat the number of swimmers needed to complete each level. Each level gets more challenging. If you miss a swimmer he/she will swim safely to the beach. If you miss too many swimmers the game is over! Complete all 5 levels and you Win the Game!

There are 4 Skill levels and 5 exciting game levels to play.

There are two styles of game play, "Regular" & "One Shot"

Regular - allows you to miss 3 swimmers in any level before game is over.

One Shot - if you miss 1 swimmer in any level, the game is over.

How many swimmers can you eat?  You have to play to find out!  

Be careful, it is not as easy as it sounds!

Enjoy!


* If you like this app, please write a review and also share this app with your friends and associates on Facebook and Twitter. Thank you for your support.

** We work very hard to make our apps the best they can be and want our users to have a great user experience. If you have ideas on how to make this app better, or If you are experiencing technical problems with this app, please don't write a bad review but instead please contact us by pressing the "App Support" button.

Thank you.
